cv_text:
SARAH JOHNSON - SENIOR PYTHON DEVELOPER

CONTACT INFORMATION
Email: sarah.johnson@email.com
Phone: (555) 123-4567
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/sarahjohnson
GitHub: github.com/sarahjohnson
Location: San Francisco, CA

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Highly experienced Senior Python Developer with 7+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications, microservices architecture, and cloud infrastructure. Proven track record of leading development teams and delivering high-quality software solutions that serve millions of users. Strong background in agile methodologies, DevOps practices, and modern software engineering principles.

TECHNICAL SKILLS
• Programming Languages: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL
• Web Frameworks: Django, Flask, FastAPI, React.js, Node.js
• Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Elasticsearch
• Cloud Platforms: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, CloudFormation), Azure
• DevOps & Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Git, Terraform, Ansible
• Testing: pytest, unittest, Selenium, Jest
• Other: REST APIs, GraphQL, Microservices, Agile/Scrum, CI/CD

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Senior Python Developer | TechFlow Solutions | 2020 - Present
• Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ daily active users
• Implemented automated CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 75%
• Mentored team of 5 junior developers and conducted code reviews
• Designed and built RESTful APIs handling 50K+ requests per minute
• Optimized database queries resulting in 40% performance improvement
• Technologies: Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes

Python Developer | DataCorp Inc. | 2018 - 2020
• Developed data processing pipelines handling 10TB+ daily data volume
• Built real-time analytics dashboard using Django and React.js
• Implemented caching strategies reducing API response time by 60%
• Collaborated with data scientists to deploy ML models in production
• Technologies: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, React.js

Junior Python Developer | StartupXYZ | 2017 - 2018
• Developed web applications using Django framework
• Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways
• Participated in agile development processes and daily standups
• Technologies: Python, Django, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS

EDUCATION
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
University of California, Berkeley | 2013 - 2017
• Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, Software Engineering
• GPA: 3.8/4.0

CERTIFICATIONS
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate (2022)
• Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) (2021)
• MongoDB Certified Developer (2020)

PROJECTS
• E-commerce Platform: Built scalable e-commerce platform serving 100K+ users using Django, PostgreSQL, and AWS
• Real-time Chat Application: Developed real-time messaging system using WebSockets, Redis, and React.js
• Data Analytics Pipeline: Created ETL pipeline processing customer data using Apache Airflow and Python

ACHIEVEMENTS
• Reduced server costs by 35% through optimization and cloud migration
• Improved application performance by 50% through database optimization
• Successfully led migration of monolithic application to microservices
• Mentored 10+ junior developers throughout career
